overview:
Israel is an Associate Partner at Cultivation Capital. He manages general operations for the firm and coordinates value-adding interaction between portfolio companies and Cultivationâ€™s network of partners.

In addition to his role at Cultivation Capital, he serves as the Director of Education and Online Media for AEGIS Professional Services and ELECTIO Investments in Clayton, Missouri.

Israel formerly managed business development activities for Revenue Trades, a crowdfunding platform with comprehensive risk management features to make crowdfunding investment viable. Before Revenue Trades, Israel was the Community Manager for Gust, the angel investing group management platform used by the majority of angel groups throughout the world.
